name: Military vehicle Fight Simulator
description:
Complete military trucks missions, fight against enemies, destroy your rivals in car crashes, smash and explode with incredible Military vehicle Fight Simulator with weapon!
FEATURES
- Breath-taking cars wars of military trucks;
- Feel like a true racing car driver;
- Modify and upgrade your vehicle;
- Make car crashes with other military trucks;
- Try new locations of this military car driving game;
